tool.name: FidoAdapter
tool.description: Runs the protein inference engine Fido.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && mkdir out &&
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}'
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("idxml")}' '$out' #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.label: Process multiple protein identification runs in the input separately, don't merge them
param.help: Merging results in loss of descriptive information of the single protein identification runs

param.label: Post-process Fido output with greedy resolution of shared peptides based on the protein probabilities
param.help: Also adds the resolved ambiguity groups to output

param.label: Omit clean-up of peptide sequences (removal of non-letter characters, replacement of I with L)
Consider all PSMs of each peptide, instead of only the best one
Perform inference on protein group level (instead of individual protein level)
param.help: This will lead to higher probabilities for (bigger) protein groups

param.label: Binary logarithm of the max
param.help: number of connected states in a subgraph. For a value N, subgraphs that are bigger than 2^N will be split up, sacrificing accuracy for runtime. '0' uses the default (18)

section.name: prob
section.title: Probability values for running Fido directly
section.help: i.e. without parameter estimation (in which case other settings, except 'log2_states', are ignored)

param.label: Keep the group of proteins with estimated probability of zero, which is otherwise removed (it may be very large)
Accuracy level of start parameters
param.help: There is a trade-off between accuracy and runtime. Empty uses the default ('best')

param.label: Like 'log2_states', but allows to set a separate limit for the precalculation
Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Runs the protein inference engine Fido.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/doxygen/release/2.8.0/html/TOPP_FidoAdapter.html
